name: Quantum-Wireless
tag_list: wireless-technology, e-commerce, tech-guru, networking-experts, quantum-networks, amazon, ebay, newegg, buy-com, bestbuy, customer-service, ecommerce-channels, 3g, 4g, wimax, lte, wi-fi, phone-accessories, cellphone-signal-booster, router, gps-tracker
overview:
Quantum-Wireless.com is a leader in wireless solutions globally. The company provides a robust line of products & services and is driven by extreme customer care and service. With a company culture fueled by intuition, creativity, innovation and technical expertise, the Quantum team channels these attributes into its strategic vision, business practices and all customer interactions. Through our unique sales-assist model, Quantum-Wireless is dedicated to providing superior customer service to each and every customer, no matter how large or small.

Quantum-Wireless.com is a pioneer in innovative next-generation technology geared to the wireless community and provides customized solutions for your Wi-Fi networks, 3G & 4G connectivity and other wireless equipment. Our wireless experts can advise you on all our wireless products — cell phone accessories, data &able wireless solution in the marketplace.

You can call us at 1-877.259.4629. We are available to assist you Monday through Thursday - 9AM to 5PM and Friday - 9AM to 3PM (EST), excluding major holidays. No service on weekends. Our offices are located in Manhattan, near Bryant Park (corner of 6th Avenue and 42nd Street) and our warehouse is situated in New Jersey.
